summary: This document is an invoice dated December 29, 2000, detailing charges related to international services provided by Epstein & Co. The invoice includes transportation and duty charges amounting to $169.33, with references to shipments and recipient details.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is associated with the company Epstein & Co, which is referenced in the invoice.

persons.name: Linda Pinto
persons.context: Linda Pinto is mentioned as the recipient of a shipment associated with the invoice.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein's company, Epstein & Co, is providing services to Linda Pinto as the recipient of a shipment.

keyFacts: Total charges on the invoice amount to $169.33.
The invoice references a shipment sent to Linda Pinto in Paris.
The invoice includes details about transportation and duty charges.
The document is marked as confidential.
